trans-unit.source: Indicates how an assembly should be produced.
trans-unit.target: 指示应该如何生成程序集。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibConverter.ConvertTypeLibToAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibConverter.ConvertTypeLibToAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Imports a type library for any platform.
trans-unit.target: 导入任何平台的类型库。

trans-unit.source: Imports a library for the ARM platform.
trans-unit.target: 导入 ARM 平台的库。

trans-unit.source: Imports a type library for the Itanium platform.
trans-unit.target: 导入 Itanium 平台的类型库。

trans-unit.source: Imports a type library for the x86 64-bit platform.
trans-unit.target: 导入 x86 64 位平台的类型库。

trans-unit.source: Imports a type library for the x86 platform.
trans-unit.target: 导入 x86 平台的类型库。

trans-unit.source: Prevents inclusion of a version resource in the interop assembly.
trans-unit.target: 防止将版本资源包含在互操作程序集中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineVersionInfoResource" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineVersionInfoResource" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: No special settings.
trans-unit.target: 没有特殊设置。

trans-unit.source: This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认设置。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: Generates a primary interop assembly.
trans-unit.target: 生成主互操作程序集。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.PrimaryInteropAssemblyAttribute" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.PrimaryInteropAssemblyAttribute" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: A keyfile must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定密钥文件。

trans-unit.source: Uses reflection-only loading.
trans-unit.target: 使用只反射加载。

trans-unit.source: Imports all <see langword="SAFEARRAY" /> instances as <see cref="T:System.Array" /> instead of typed, single-dimensional, zero-based managed arrays.
trans-unit.target: 将所有 <see langword="SAFEARRAY" /> 实例导入为 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，而不是类型化的、一维的、从零开始的托管数组。

trans-unit.source: This option is useful when dealing with multi-dimensional, non-zero-based <see langword="SAFEARRAY" /> instances, which otherwise cannot be accessed unless you edit the resulting assembly by using the MSIL Disassembler (Ildasm.exe) and MSIL Assembler (Ilasm.exe) tools.
trans-unit.target: 此选项可用于处理多维的、非从零开始的 <see langword="SAFEARRAY" /> 实例，除非使用 MSIL 反汇编程序 (Ildasm.exe) 和 MSIL 汇编程序 (Ilasm.exe) 工具编辑结果程序集，否则将无法访问这些数组。

trans-unit.source: Uses serializable classes.
trans-unit.target: 使用可序列化的类。

trans-unit.source: Transforms <see langword="[out, retval]" /> parameters of methods on dispatch-only interfaces ([dispinterface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e8c18ae5-3d9e-4dff-aa20-b5acc723eacf)) into return values.
trans-unit.target: 将仅支持调度的接口 ([dispinterface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e8c18ae5-3d9e-4dff-aa20-b5acc723eacf)) 上的方法的 <see langword="[out, retval]" /> 参数转换为返回值。

trans-unit.source: Imports all interfaces as interfaces that suppress the common language runtime's stack crawl for <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" /> permission.
trans-unit.target: 将所有接口导入为取消公共语言运行时为 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" /> 权限所进行的堆栈爬行遍历的接口。

trans-unit.source: Be sure you understand the responsibilities associated with suppressing this security check.
trans-unit.target: 你一定要理解与取消该安全检查关联的责任。
